name: Virus Breaker
description:
A 3D take of the classic genre. Play as a Virus trying to hack a evil Megacorp..

Press A to use the paddle and the direction keys to move.

If you play this game, please fill this form about your experience: https://goo.gl/forms/me7Gbu59SD7BxzyH3

Extra credits:

Music: megupets - Insert Coin
